narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Quest Diagnostics Venture LLC is a Clinical Medical Laboratory provider based in Pittsburgh, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $96.0M in Medicaid payments across 3.6M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $96.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
